tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart
type: Tutorial Step - Adjust for Your Exchange

definition.text: You may remember this question from the welcome tutorial. Are you trading at binance.com or binance.us?

paragraphs.text: This workspace was built using binance.us. If that is your exchange go ahead and skip this step. However, if your data is stored on binance.com you will need to make one quick adjustment.
Configure the Binance node to your left.
Open the configuration and change the codeName to binance. Move the mouse pointer out of the configuration bubble and it will close and save automatically.
Edit the label of the node to read Binance.
